description: The BTC Low Volatility Set is for you if you believe the price of Bitcoin will swing within a smaller range in the medium to long term. This Set automatically rebalances cash (DAI) into BTC if the price of BTC dips more than 20% and BTC into cash (DAI) if the price of BTC rebounds more than 25%. The token tolerances are selected to balance profit against risk, preventing token holders from selling into a rally (or buying into a drop) yet still taking profits when the downside of missing a trade is too high.
name: BTC Range Bond Low Volatility Set
